north_star: To streamline and automate the software delivery process, ensuring fast, reliable, and secure deployments.
mission: To provide robust CI/CD pipelines, deployment tools, and automation frameworks that enable development teams to deliver software efficiently and confidently.
vision: To create a seamless and fully automated delivery pipeline that minimizes manual intervention, reduces deployment risks, and accelerates time-to-market.

core.description: Individuals or teams directly utilizing the delivery pipelines and tools.
core.value: Product Engineering Teams, Backend Development Teams

supportive.description: Individuals or teams that influence or support the Delivery team's initiatives.
supportive.value: Platform Engineering Team, DevX Team, Observability Team

peripheral.description: External or less directly involved stakeholders who have an interest in the Delivery team's outcomes.
peripheral.value: InfoSec Team, Operations Team, Business Leadership

kpis.justification: Higher deployment frequency indicates a smoother and more efficient delivery process.
kpis.measurement: Number of deployments per week or month.
kpis.outbound: Monthly deployment reports to Engineering Teams

kpis.justification: Fewer deployment failures lead to higher reliability and less downtime.
kpis.outbound: Monthly reliability reports to Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Decrease mean time to recovery (MTTR) for deployment failures.
kpis.justification: Faster recovery from failures minimizes disruptions and maintains service quality.
kpis.measurement: Average time taken to recover from deployment failures.
kpis.outbound: Monthly incident reports to Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Enhance security and compliance of deployment processes.
kpis.justification: Secure deployment processes protect against vulnerabilities and ensure compliance.
kpis.measurement: Number of security incidents related to deployments.
kpis.outbound: Monthly security and compliance reports to InfoSec and Business Leadership

kpis.objective: Improve developer satisfaction with deployment processes.
kpis.justification: Positive developer feedback indicates efficient and user-friendly deployment tools.
kpis.measurement: Developer satisfaction scores from internal surveys.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly satisfaction reports to Engineering Leadership
